title: Kurt Baluses
text: Kurt Baluses (30 June 1914 – 28 March 1972) was a German <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player and manager. He was the first manager of <a href="VfB%20Stuttgart">VfB Stuttgart</a> in the then newly founded <a href="Bundesliga">Bundesliga</a> and also had the biggest success of his managing career with the club, leading Stuttgart to a 5th-place finish in <a href="1963%E2%80%9364%20Bundesliga">1963–64</a>.
